subject: Application Received - Software Engineer at TechCorp
plaintext:
Dear Candidate,

Thank you for applying to the Software Engineer position at TechCorp. We have received your application and will review it shortly.

Best regards,
HR Team

subject: Your Application - Data Analyst Role
plaintext:
Hi there,

We have successfully received your application for the Data Analyst position. Your application is now under review by our hiring team.

Thank you for your interest in joining our company.

Best,
Recruitment Team

subject: Interview Invitation - Frontend Developer
plaintext:
Hello,

We would like to schedule an interview for the Frontend Developer position. Are you available next Tuesday at 2 PM for a technical screen?

Please confirm your availability.

Thanks,
Sarah Johnson, Hiring Manager

subject: Phone Screen - Marketing Manager Position
plaintext:
Hi,

We'd like to schedule a 30-minute phone screening for the Marketing Manager role at DevStart Inc. Let me know your availability this week.

Best regards,
Talent Acquisition

subject: Onsite Interview - Product Manager
plaintext:
Dear Candidate,

Congratulations! We would like to invite you for an onsite interview at our headquarters for the Product Manager position.

Please let us know your preferred dates.

Regards,
HR Department

subject: Job Offer - Senior DevOps Engineer
plaintext:
Congratulations!

We are pleased to extend an offer for the Senior DevOps Engineer position at CloudTech Solutions. Please find the offer letter attached.

We look forward to having you on our team.

Best regards,
Hiring Team

subject: Update on Your Application - Backend Developer
plaintext:
Thank you for your interest in the Backend Developer position. After careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with other candidates.

We encourage you to apply for future openings that match your skills.

Best wishes,
Talent Team

subject: Application Status - QA Engineer
plaintext:
Hi,

We appreciate your application for the QA Engineer role. Unfortunately, we will not be moving forward with your candidacy at this time.

Thank you for your time and interest.

Sincerely,
Recruitment

subject: Your Netflix subscription expires soon
plaintext:
Your monthly Netflix subscription will expire in 3 days. Please update your payment method to continue enjoying our services.

Click here to update billing information.

subject: Weekly Newsletter - Tech Trends
plaintext:
This week in technology:

- New JavaScript framework released
- AI developments in healthcare
- Cybersecurity best practices

Read more at our blog.

subject: Bank Statement Available
plaintext:
Your monthly bank statement for October 2024 is now available for download in your online banking portal.

Login to view your statement.

subject: Meeting Reminder - Project Sync
plaintext:
Hi Team,

Reminder about our weekly project sync meeting tomorrow at 10 AM EST. We'll be discussing Q4 deliverables and resource allocation.

See you there!
Project Manager
